DESCRIPTION: Develop an AI assistant that can generate automated responses for customer inquiries based on predefined datasets.

REQUIREMENTS.KNOWLEDGE_BASE: Predefined customer FAQs and support documents

STEPS: Analyze customer support data and common inquiries.
Select the most relevant AI model for natural language processing.
Develop a response generation module that adapts to customer sentiment.
Implement feedback learning to improve AI responses over time.
Deploy and test the AI assistant in a simulated environment.
EXPECTED_OUTPUT: A functional AI assistant capable of responding to customer inquiries with predefined responses and adaptive learning.
